<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lavasoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=2555) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 102 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your elemental lineage manifests as magma and molten rock, and you can focus the magma into your hand to attack your foes. You gain a magma spike unarmed attack, which requires a free hand to use. This is an [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) weapon group that deals 1d4 piercing damage, as well as 1 additional fire damage. Instead of the normal critical specialization effect, the target takes 1d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29); you gain a bonus on this persistent damage equal to your item bonus to attack rolls on unarmed attacks.
name: Lavasoul
